docs.lead_paragraph: Members of the government’s volunteer corps should receive the same coverage as other federal workers.

headline.seo: Abortions Should Be Covered by Insurance

docs.abstract: Editorial urges Congress to repeal prohibition on abortion coverage included in health care package for Peace Corps volunteers; notes that women make up over 60 percent of volunteers, and often serve in places where they are vulnerable to sexual assault; argues that proposed repeal would merely extend to women in Peace Corps same coverage available to other people who work for government and Medicaid recipients.
docs.snippet: Members of the government’s volunteer corps should receive the same coverage as other federal workers.

docs.lead_paragraph: Under a new law signed Friday by Gov. Rick Scott, abortions will be illegal in Florida at any point in a woman’s pregnancy if her doctor determines that the fetus could survive outside the womb.

headline.main: Florida: Law Bans Abortion Based on Fetus’s Ability to Survive
headline.print_headline: Florida: Law Bans Abortion Based on Fetus’s Ability to Survive

docs.abstract: Florida Gov Rick Scott signs law making abortions illegal in Florida at any point in a woman’s pregnancy if her doctor determines that the fetus could survive outside the womb.

headline.main: Threat Grows From Liver Illness Tied to Obesity
headline.print_headline: Threat Grows From Liver Illness Tied to Obesity

docs.abstract: Despite major gains in fighting hepatitis C and other chronic liver conditions, public health officials are now faced with a growing epidemic of liver disease that is tightly linked to the obesity crisis.
docs.snippet: Despite major gains in fighting hepatitis C and other chronic liver conditions, public health officials are now faced with a growing epidemic of liver disease that is tightly linked to the obesity crisis.

docs.lead_paragraph: Florida Governor Rick Scott signed legislation on Friday barring late-term abortions in cases where doctors determine an unborn child could survive outside the womb, in a move critics say further chips away at abortion rights.

headline.print_headline: Florida Governor Signs New Abortion Restrictions

docs.lead_paragraph: Ms. Dee, who earned acclaim in “A Raisin in the Sun” and “American Gangster,” sought roles that addressed racial issues and campaigned for civil rights with her husband, Ossie Davis.

headline.main: Ruby Dee, a Ringing Voice for Civil Rights, Onstage and Off, Dies at 91
headline.print_headline: Ruby Dee, Actress and Activist, Dies at 91

docs.abstract: Ruby Dee, one of the most enduring actresses of theater and film, dies at age 91; Dee's public profile and activist passions made her, along with her husband Ossie Davis, leading advocate for civil rights both in show business and in the wider world.
docs.snippet: Ms. Dee, who earned acclaim in “A Raisin in the Sun” and “American Gangster,” sought roles that addressed racial issues and campaigned for civil rights with her husband, Ossie Davis.

docs.lead_paragraph: More than 100 U.S. lawmakers and lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender rights groups on Thursday urged the Obama administration to stop trade talks with Brunei unless the country revokes Islamic criminal laws they say jeopardize human rights.

headline.main: Lawmakers, LGBT Groups Urge U.S. Trade Action on Brunei Criminal Laws
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers, LGBT Groups Urge U.S. Trade Action on Brunei Criminal Laws

docs.snippet: More than 100 U.S. lawmakers and lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender rights groups on Thursday urged the Obama administration to stop trade talks with Brunei unless the country revokes Islamic criminal laws they say jeopardize human rights.
